body: I can see that this issue had already been [fixed](https://go.googlesource.com/tools/+/97e67f4f65bd17a63beb92f1e824f662aba1721a). But yesterday, although I did a fresh `go get golang.org/x/tools/cmd/stringer`, I still experience this same issue. Why does it still persist? Does anyone care enough to apply the fix to the main repo?
